rule: Each description must be longer than eighty words in length.
input: An extensive paragraph that goes into great length describing every minor detail of the scene, ensuring that the total word count surpasses the eighty-word threshold, thereby violating the input specification of not exceeding eighty words.
output: Please provide me with a concise description of your desired image, keeping it under 80 words. I need to understand the main subjects, their characteristics, lighting and background to craft a detailed prompt for AI photo generation.  Describe the feeling you want the image to evoke, and I'll do my best to capture it!
complianceText:
The chatbot is intended to transform user descriptions into detailed prompts for AI photo generation. However, the provided output is prompting the user to supply a description instead of transforming an existing one. This behavior does not align with the described role of the chatbot.

ERR
